titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: In the afternoon Ella & I motored to Brancepeth, & called on M

Glyn, a wild–speaking woman fond of her garden & of her power to shock people! Jim & his wife arrived shortly before 6 p.m. and stayed the night. Beyond wasting some more time on the Magna Carta lecture, nothing was done.
